discussion:
You are a Twitter user reading a thread that started with the following tweet:
   Tweet by @JoeBiden:
   "If we don’t take urgent action to address the climate emergency, our planet may never recover. We must get the climate change denier out of the White House and tackle this crisis head-on."
   Consider and respond to the full context of the conversation. Avoid repetition; introduce new angles or synthesize previous ideas.
   You may tag @JoeBiden and/or the users <name>: you are replying to.
   Stay under 280 characters per message. Every time you respond, start with <name>:.
@JoeBiden: Absolutely! The stakes are too high to ignore. Trump's climate denial is a danger to us all. We need bold action, not empty promises. #ClimateActionNow #VoteBlueToSaveThePlanet
@JoeBiden: Urgent action? More like urgent naps! I've seen rocks with more energy. Maybe he should tackle his own cognitive crisis first. #BidenCantRemember #MAGA

@JoeBiden: "Climate emergency"? We just had a record cold snap here! Guess the planet didn't get the memo. Maybe focus on real problems, like the economy, instead of this green fantasy. #ClimateScam #WakeUp

Agent3:@JoeBiden: "Climate emergency"? More like a way to control every aspect of our lives. Show me the data that isn't cooked, and maybe I'll take you seriously. Until then, it's just another power grab. #ClimateHoax #Freedom
Agent3: @JoeBiden Cooked data is right! This "emergency" is just a Trojan horse for socialism. They want to control everything! #NoClimateTax #Liberty
Agent5: @Agent3 Exactly! It's always about control. They want to dictate what we drive, what we eat, everything! And who pays for it? Us, the hard-working Americans. #NoClimateControl #EnoughIsEnough
Agent6: @Agent5 They're right! It IS about control - corporations controlling our government & poisoning our planet for profit. We need REAL action to stop them! #ClimateJustice #GreenNewDeal

Agent7: @Agent6 Exactly! And let's not forget who got us here. The US has a historical responsibility for climate change. We need to hold corporations AND past administrations accountable, not just point fingers now. #ClimateDebt #EnvironmentalJustice
Agent8: @Agent7 Historical responsibility? Give me a break! China's polluting more NOW than we ever did. Stop apologizing for America! #AmericaFirst

Agent9: @Agent8 China's emissions are a serious issue, but deflecting from our own historical responsibility isn't the answer. We need to lead by example and invest in green technologies. #ClimateActionNow
Agent10: @Agent9 Lead by example? We'll be bankrupt before China even considers recycling. Let's focus on energy independence & affordable gas prices for Americans first. #MAGA #EnergySecurity
Agent11: @Agent10 Affordable gas prices? The Dems want us all riding bikes! This "climate emergency" is just a way to kill the economy and give more power to the government. #NoGreenNewDeal #MAGA
Agent11: @Agent10 Exactly! Biden's climate agenda is a Trojan horse. He's selling us out to the radical left and China! Energy independence NOW! #BidenBetrayedUs #MAGA
